content: In the Quran the sun and the moon will merge. Skeptics claim that whoever wrote the Quran made a mistake; the sun can never touch the moon. Today scientists confirm that the sun will eventually expand and engulf the inner planets including Earth and the moon.
A red giant is a dying star in the final stages of stellar evolution.
heading: In about five billion years, our own sun will turn into a red giant, expand and engulf the inner planets — including Earth.
reference_title: Space, Red giant stars: Facts, definition & the future of the sun, 2023.

content: Our sun is destined to swallow Earth and the moon. This was known recently; however this was portrayed in the Quran 1400 years before it was discovered.

Quran 75:9
And the sun and the moon are joined together.
The sun and the moon will merge. Today we know that the sun will eventually expand and engulf the inner planets including Earth and the moon.
How could an illiterate man who lived 1400 years ago have known that the sun will merge with the moon?
